data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Free kick for Mainz in the half of Hertha.
In the minute 2, Matthias Jollenbeck signals a Hertha throw-in in Mainz's half.
Hertha awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hertha to take a throw-in in Mainz territory.
In the minute 4, Matthias Jollenbeck signals a free kick to Hertha.
Mainz needs to be cautious. Hertha have an attacking throw-in.
In Berlin a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 9, Matthias Jollenbeck signals a free kick to Mainz in their own half.
Lucas Tousart for Hertha gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Mainz at Olympiastadion.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Hertha in the half of Mainz.
Free kick for Mainz in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 17, Hertha awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Hertha get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mainz's half?
Free kick Hertha.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Mainz in their own half.
Corner awarded to Mainz.
Matthias Jollenbeck awards Hertha a goal kick.
In the minute 25, Mainz have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Mainz in the half of Hertha.
Matthias Jollenbeck signals a free kick to Hertha in their own half.
In the minute 28, Kevin Stoger (Mainz) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Free kick in a good position for Hertha!
Ball goes out of play for a Mainz goal kick.
In the minute 32, Mainz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Mainz in their own half.
Krzysztof Piatek for Hertha has been booked by Matthias Jollenbeck and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 34, Matthias Jollenbeck signals a Mainz throw-in in Hertha's half.
Matthias Jollenbeck signals a throw-in for Mainz, close to Hertha's area.
Throw-in Hertha.
In the minute 35, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Hertha have been awarded a corner by Matthias Jollenbeck.
Javairo Dilrosun for Hertha drives towards goal at Olympiastadion. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 38, Mainz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Mainz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hertha's half?
Matthias Jollenbeck signals a free kick to Mainz in their own half.
In the minute 40, Mainz to take a throw-in in Hertha territory.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Berlin.
Throw-in for Mainz in the half of Hertha.
In the minute 42, Mainz have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Hertha in their own half.
Throw-in for Mainz at Olympiastadion.
In the minute 44, Hertha's Matheus Cunha gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Matthias Jollenbeck awards Mainz a goal kick.
Matthias Jollenbeck signals a Mainz throw-in in Hertha's half.
In the minute 45, Matthias Jollenbeck blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway in Berlin.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 47, Mainz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Hertha at Olympiastadion.
Matthias Jollenbeck signals a free kick to Mainz in their own half.
In the minute 49, Matheus Cunha (Hertha) gets a yellow card.
Matthias Jollenbeck signals a free kick to Hertha in their own half.
Hertha have a goal kick.
In the minute 53, Mainz to take a throw-in in Hertha territory.
Kevin Stoger of Mainz gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Hertha goal kick.
In the minute 54, Mainz have been awarded a corner by Matthias Jollenbeck.
Matthias Jollenbeck signals a free kick to Mainz.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Berlin.
In the minute 57, Can Hertha get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mainz's half?
Free kick Hertha.
Matthias Jollenbeck awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 59, Ball safe as Mainz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Matthias Jollenbeck signals a Hertha throw-in in Mainz's half.
Throw-in for Mainz in their own half.
In the minute 60, Mainz awarded a free kick in their own half.
The home team replace Marvin Plattenhardt with Maximilian Mittelstadt.
Dodi Lukebakio is on a sub for Javairo Dilrosun for Hertha.
In the minute 62, Mainz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mainz to take a throw-in in Hertha territory.
In Berlin a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 66, Jordan Torunarigha (Hertha) has received a first yellow card.
Corner awarded to Mainz.
Throw-in for Mainz in their own half.
In the minute 69, Hertha surge into the attack at Olympiastadion but Lucas Tousart’s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Mainz at Olympiastadion.
Corner awarded to Mainz.
In the minute 70, Can Mainz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hertha's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Mainz goal kick.
Free kick for Mainz in their own half.
The home team have replaced Lucas Tousart with Mathew Leckie. This is the second substitution made today by Bruno Labbadia.
In the minute 72, Bruno Labbadia (Hertha) is making a third substitution, with Peter Pekarik replacing Deyovaisio Zeefuik.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for Hertha in the half of Mainz.
Matthias Jollenbeck signals a free kick to Hertha in their own half.
Danny Latza is replacing Kevin Stoger for Mainz at Olympiastadion.
In the minute 78, Hertha have been awarded a corner by Matthias Jollenbeck.
Jan Moritz Lichte is making the team's second substitution at Olympiastadion with Jean-Philippe Mateta replacing Robin Quaison.
Mainz make their third substitution with Jonathan Michael Burkardt replacing Karim Onisiwo.
In the minute 81, Throw-in high up the field for Hertha in Berlin.
Corner awarded to Hertha.
Free kick for Mainz in their own half.
In the minute 83, Can Mainz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hertha's half?
Hertha awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Mainz in the half of Hertha.
In the minute 88, Hertha have been awarded a corner by Matthias Jollenbeck.
Mainz awarded a free kick in their own half.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Matthias Jollenbeck signals a Mainz throw-in in Hertha's half.
Mainz to take a throw-in in Hertha territory.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-0.
The home team replace Krzysztof Piatek with Jessic Ngankam.
